actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill relating to the financing of certain solid waste disposal facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Recyclable Commodities Financing Act of 1989

summary.text: National Recyclable Commodities Financing Act of 1989 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the issuance of tax-exempt facility bonds for qualified recycling facilities. Exempts such government-owned facilities from a volume cap. Allows an investment tax credit for certain remanufacturing equipment.

titles.title: National Recyclable Commodities Financing Act of 1989
A bill relating to the financing of certain solid waste disposal facilities, and for other purposes.
